Title: S11:E4 - How to get into game development (Jonathan Jennings)
Description: In this episode, we’re talking about game development with Jonathan Jennings, software engineer at RelayCars. We get into how he got into game design, the struggles of learning to code, and what it takes to be a successful game designer. Show Links Partner with Dev & CodeNewbie!
